thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Strongly recommend
thread.title_full: Strongly recommend - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Robert F
title: Strongly recommend
text:
I agree with all positive review posted here. This is a lovely hotel, modern design, close by walking distance to everything in Rome.
Room are comfortable, breakfast are excellent, nice rooftop with a bar and serving light snack. Staff, all of them, let you feel you are a valuable customer.
Floor 2 and 3 have a little balcony for smokers. There is a laundry room where you can clean your clothes for a nominal amount, including soap. Microwave on some floor, vending machine, a sona on 4th floor, playground for the kids and a gym on first floor.
Free fast wifi, excellent tv channel choice.
In a nutshell, this hotel is perfectly designed for tourist who are seeking for convenience without sacrificing good hospitality, comfort and modern lifestyle.
